description.action: Evan, still in owl form, continues to grip Bowser's cape in his talons, pulling it tighter over the Koopa King's head to blind him.
Isaac, as a koala, remains clinging to the side of the throne, watching the events unfold.
Aurelia, as a panda, rolls a large ball towards Bowser's feet, causing him to trip and fall to the ground, trapped under the cape.
Aaron, still in dinosaur form, stands ready to assist his siblings in their efforts to subdue Bowser.
Bowser, completely blinded by Evan's attack, stumbles around the throne room, tangled in his own cape and unable to free himself.
